name: Cooking Witch
description: In Cooking Witch you are a witch flying to a party in the woods, abducting the children and cooking and eating them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Press the "Q" key at anytime if the game is running slow to toggle effects quality
